body_html: @npanpaliya , I'm not sure how the math worked in this case, but it does seem odd that the expected results are different if using float vs uint8. Maybe this is due to a rounding error. Perhaps you can attempt to change the input of the testcase to values where the results for float and uint8 are the same?
